name: Qooxtunes
tagline: Web-based XBMC library management and playback control.
body:
## News

What's new in version 1.1?

* new flat look
* real-time playback controls
* improved sorting in song tables
* "select all" option in song tables
* added album artist and disc # to tables
* added filtering capabilities to song tables (by artist, by album)
* allow dragging tracks from playlist table onto a playlist to add tracks from one playlist to another
numerous bug fixes (see CHANGELOG for details)

## Download the Add-on

[Download add-on for XBMC](http://smorgasbork.com/qooxtunes/webinterface.qooxtunes-1.1.0.zip)

Note -- this is the pre-built add-on for XBMC.  If you download the source from the github repo, you'll have to install qooxdoo and use the package.sh script to build the add-on.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
